CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): 3.1a, testdateformat (3N) and 3.1b, testdate (8N) will need to map in the following format CCYYMMDD (code 102).
E2B (R3): F.r.1 Test Date User Guidance: This data element captures the date of the test or procedure. Imprecise dates can be used. Conformance: Optional, but required if F.r.2 is populated. Data Type: Date / Time OID: None Value Allowed: See Appendix II for further information. nullFlavor = UNK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures the date of the test or procedure. Imprecise dates can be used.
CustomField.label: Test Date
